version_description:
• Bug fixes - There were some screens that users could get stuck on; no longer!
• Performance enhancements - Less memory usage and a smaller app size!

- Improved the load time of the app.
- Squashed the last few Apple Pay bugs that were preventing us from getting it into all of your hands.

• Bug fixes - There were some screens that users could get stuck on; no longer!
• Performance enhancements - Less memory usage and a smaller app size!

- Improved the load time of the app.
- Squashed the last few Apple Pay bugs that were preventing us from getting it into all of your hands.
Get hyped everyone because soon you will be able to use your Affirm virtual card with Apple Pay. We will be rolling this feature out to all users in the coming weeks.
Get hyped everyone because soon you will be able to use your Affirm virtual card with Apple Pay. We will be rolling this feature out to all users in the coming weeks.

- Improved the load time of the app.
- Squashed the last few Apple Pay bugs that were preventing us from getting it into all of your hands.

- Improved the load time of the app.
- Squashed the last few Apple Pay bugs that were preventing us from getting it into all of your hands.
A quick release to fix some lingering bugs.
A quick release to fix some lingering bugs.

Bug fixes and other improvements.

Please note, you'll need to have iOS 10.3+ in order to download the latest version of our app.

Bug fixes and other improvements.

Please note, you'll need to have iOS 10.3+ in order to download the latest version of our app.

- We have heard loud and clear that some of you are having issues where the app constantly logs you out. Fixing it is a top priority and this release contains changes that will allow us to better identify these incidents and fix them ASAP!
- We sanded off a couple of the rough edges when taking out a loan to ensure the process is as smooth as possible.
- You'll find the "Insights" tab is faster and even more insightful than ever. We're working hard to surface every useful bit of information we can gleam about your credit cards.
- There are also some sweet new features being tweaked under the hood that we can't wait to roll out in the coming weeks. Stay tuned!

- We have heard loud and clear that some of you are having issues where the app constantly logs you out. Fixing it is a top priority and this release contains changes that will allow us to better identify these incidents and fix them ASAP!
- We sanded off a couple of the rough edges when taking out a loan to ensure the process is as smooth as possible.
- You'll find the "Insights" tab is faster and even more insightful than ever. We're working hard to surface every useful bit of information we can gleam about your credit cards.
- There are also some sweet new features being tweaked under the hood that we can't wait to roll out in the coming weeks. Stay tuned!

A Face ID bug squeaked into the v3.18.0 release that causes the app to crash on launch for some users. We're sorry this made it into the release and promptly stomped it out!

Added in v3.18.0
- We have heard loud and clear that some of you are having issues where the app constantly logs you out. Fixing it is a top priority and this release contains changes that will allow us to better identify these incidents and fix them ASAP!
- We sanded off a couple of the rough edges when taking out a loan to ensure the process is as smooth as possible.
- You'll find the "Insights" tab is faster and even more insightful than ever. We're working hard to surface every useful bit of information we can gleam about your credit cards.
- There are also some sweet new features being tweaked under the hood that we can't wait to roll out in the coming weeks. Stay tuned!

- There are also some sweet new features being tweaked under the hood that we can't wait to roll out in the coming weeks. Stay tuned!

The app now shows an alert if you have made a payment recently to prevent accidental repeat-payments.

Welcome to the new Affirm app! Take a look around—we’ve made some changes we think you’ll like.
Welcome to the new Affirm app! Take a look around—we’ve made some changes we think you’ll like.

• UI and animation improvements on the home screen
• More helpful error messages when linking a bank account fails
• Correctly prompt for FaceID, not Touch ID on the iPhone XS Max
